name: Red Block Of Damnation
description:
If you want a simple and challenging game with unlockables and a lot of moments where you are going to say damn and get angry yet enjoy, this is the game for you

You are a Block, and you hate Circles, they also hate you, that is why you are going to destroy them

Play Through 30 small and large levels across 7 worlds

Defeat 7 Bosses each one with somewhat unique capacities

Learn from your mistakes and get better

Unlimited Lives

The game takes on how many times you die, not how many lives you have

Multiple Endings

Five Diferent Endings, each one based on how many times you die at certain parts of the game

Unlockables

14 Skins for your Block

2 Game Modes

1 Final Secret Level

Comments

Default Keys Are:

A/Left: Move Left
D/Right: Move Right
Space: Jump
Ctrl: Shoot

Numpad 0 or Start on Joystick 2 for 2 Player Mode During Game

Controller Compatible 

Simple and Responsive controls that will ensure that when you die, it is because the game is hard, but not unfair

One Last Thing To Say......THANK YOU
